file_content.text: You are no longer able to access this datacron.
You have located a datacron, an ancient technology once used by the Infinite Empire.
This datacron contains a Green Matrix Shard. You can combine it with other matrix shards.
This one is still active; use it to collect the Green Matrix Shard. Once removed, you will no longer be able to access this datacron.
You have collected the Green Matrix Shard. Perhaps there are more to be found....
